definition: equally distant from the extremes, the middle area of the human torso (usually in front), put in the middle
details:
adjective
- equally distant from the extremes
= synonyms: halfway
- between an earlier and a later period of time
= example: between an earlier and a later period of time
- of a stage in the development of a language or literature between earlier and later stages
- being neither at the beginning nor at the end in a series
= synonyms: mediate
noun
- the middle area of the human torso (usually in front)
= synonyms: midriff, midsection
- an intermediate part or section
= example: an intermediate part or section
- an area that is approximately central within some larger region
= synonyms: eye, heart
- time between the beginning and the end of a temporal period
= example: time between the beginning and the end of a temporal period
verb
- put in the middle
